ej,hebnr001,P,weyel901,Arguing strike 3 $Hebner ejected by HP umpire Weyer for arguing strike 3
ej,roges001,P,harvd901,Bench jockeying $Expos Rogers, not in game, ejected by 1B umpire Harvey for bench jockeying sometime in 7th inning
ej,sizet101,P,weyel901,Checked swing (as fielder) Ted Sizemore ejected by 1B umpire Lee Weyer after Weyer ruled Pete Rose half swing not a strike

ej,andes101,M,weyel901,Missing base on ground rule double $Reds manager Anderson ejected by HP umpire Weyer for arguing Boone not entitled to 2nd on ground rule double because he missed 1st base, although everyone agrees he returned to touch it before reaching 2nd
ej,hamid101,P,froeb901,Throwing at batter Dave Hamilton ejected by HP umpire Bruce Froemming for throwing at Bake McBride
ej,candj001,P,olsea901,Fair/foul call ej,tannc101,M,olsea901,Fair/foul call John Candelaria and Pirates Manager Chuck Tannerejected by 3B umpire Andy Olsen
ej,torrj101,M,colon901,Balls and strikes Mets Manager Joe Torre ejected by HP umpire Nick Colosi
ej,montw101,M,colon901,Balls and strikes Willie Montanez, Bobby Valentine and Mets Manager Joe Torre ejected by HP umpire Nick Colosi sometime in seventh

ej,valeb102,M,colon901,Balls and strikes $Dan Norman objected to a pitch that was called a strike by HP umpire Nick Colosi; Bobby Valentine ejected by Colosi from the bench; Colosi attempted to restart the game but walked back to The Mets dugout and ejected Willie Montanez; Montanez then dropped a towel on Colosi's shoes and threw a helmet and three bats onto the field
$outfielder Elliott Maddox was playing 1B due to the ejection of Willie Montanez; Maddox' throw to 2B went into LF
ej,bahns101,P,crawj901,Call at 1B Stan Bahnsen ejected by 1B umpire Jerry Crawford
